sentences.english: The classes of our university closed for the summer vacation.
Education Department announces closure of morning and all-day schools.
sentences.chinese: 教育署宣佈上午校和全日制學校停課。

sentences.english: Airlines have canceled flights and schools have been closed.
sentences.chinese: 航班已經取消，學校也停課關門了。

sentences.english: All students are required to come to school on Saturday morning as usual, but there will be no class that afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 同學們週六早晨照常到校上課，週六下午停課。

sentences.english: Stone was also suspended from Summerville High School for a week.
sentences.chinese: 同時，斯通被其所在的學校薩默維爾高中停課一週。

sentences.english: We could issue face masks to all students， we could close down all schools.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以向學生派發口罩，或要求所有學校停課。

sentences.english: Schoolchildren were yesterday sent home early when afternoon lessons were cancelled due to heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 昨午暴雨，下午校停課，學童提早放學。

sentences.english: In addition, some areas of central self-closed schools due to flu.
sentences.chinese: 另外，中部一些地區的學校因流感自行停課。

sentences.english: In New Caledonia, schools in coastal areas were evacuated.
sentences.chinese: 在新喀里多尼亞島，沿海的學校也停課，疏散學生。

sentences.english: A revised law is being drafted to include suspensions.
sentences.chinese: 新的法規正在起草中，以將停課也包括在內。

definition: to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
to have a power failure/power cut
to cease trading (temporarily or permanently)/to close down
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
(of a sports competition or match) to commence/(of a war or battle) to break out/to perform acrobatic or choreographed fighting (in Chinese opera)/to brawl/to come to blows
to attend school as a day student
to ask sb to resign from a post
